text.language: }e~pictol/ n~te pencaq Pauloc: e~re pef c~mou eyouab swpi neman: a~m/n.
An epistle of our teacher Paul; may his holy blessings be with us. Amen.

language.div: Dari Surat guru kita Rasul Paulus; kiranya berkat-berkatnya beserta kita. Amin

text.language: رسالة معلمنا بولس الرسول بركته المقدسة لتكن معنا آمين.
